scripts.client:staging: cd client/ && npm run build:staging && cd ..
scripts.client:prod: cd client/ && npm run build:prod & cd ..
scripts.build:staging: npm run client:staging && npm run grunt:staging
scripts.build:prod: npm run client:prod && npm run grunt:prod
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run clean:dist && npm run build:staging && gcloud app deploy --project=lees-friends-staging --verbosity=info --quiet --stop-previous-version
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run clean:dist && npm run build:prod && gcloud app deploy --project=lees-friends --verbosity=info
scripts.deploy:staging:noclient: npm run grunt:staging && gcloud app deploy --project=lees-friends-staging --verbosity=info --quiet --stop-previous-version
scripts.deploy:prod:noclient: npm run grunt:prod && gcloud app deploy --project=lees-friends --verbosity=info
